'''Ralph Lauren''' is a fashion designer who appeared as himself in only one episode, "[[The One With Ross' Teeth]]" (S6E08), in two cameos. [[Rachel Greene|Rachel]] works at [[Ralph Lauren Corporation|his fashion company]] starting from [[Season 5]] and stays employed there until the end of [[Season 10]], when she gets fired.

Ralph Lauren (born Ralph Lifshitz on October 14, 1939) is an American fashion designer and business executive. He is most notable for his Polo Ralph Lauren clothing brand.
